articles.title: American Rapper, Coolio, Dies At 59 - Punch Newspapers
articles.description: American rapper, Artis Ivey Jr. popularly known as Coolio, is dead.The grammy-award winning musician died on Wednesday, in the bathroom of his friend’s house in Los-Angeles.
articles.content:
American rapper, Artis Ivey Jr. popularly known as Coolio, is dead.
The grammy-award winning musician died on Wednesday, in the bathroom of his friends house in Los-Angeles.
Speaking to TMZ, Coolio… [+587 chars]
